other: This script is designed to install and configure R on an Ubuntu 20.04 system, specifically for use with the RStudio IDE and the clustermq package for parallel computing.
It uses `apt` to install system dependencies and `curl` to download R binaries.
The `gdebi` package is used to install the downloaded `.deb` files.
The script also configures R to use the `rJava` package for Java integration.
It sets up a default R version and includes a template file for running R jobs on a SLURM cluster.
It uses `aws s3 cp` to download a script from an S3 bucket.
The script configures the system environment variables for the R installations.
